## C7091 Professional skills for data science

![](img/coverImage.png){fig-alt="C7091 title slide" fig-align="center" width="400"}

Professional Skills for Data Analytics is designed to enhance the professional capacity of students in data analytics. This module provides a comprehensive grounding in essential skills required for data literacy, bolstering existing skills and framing elements of best practice standards. It covers a range of topics including an introduction to ***R programming***, an introduction to traditional ***statistical analysis and visualization***, the creation of ***GitHub webpages*** to document and communicate analyses, and the use of ***Git and Markdown*** for reproducible practice.
<br>
## Module content

- R Language: [R language](https://github.com/C7091/website/tree/main/lectures/Rlang)
- Tidy data: [Tidy data](lectures/tidy-data)
- Markdown and Github: [Markdown and Github](https://github.com/C7091/website/lectures/git-md)
- Statistical reporting: [Statistical reporting](https://github.com/C7091/website/lectures/Stats-reporting)
